apis.name: MercadoLibre
apis.description: Get the best deals on iPhone 11 Pro Max 256GB at T-Mobile. Shop iPhone 11 Pro Max 256GB and compare the latest Apple iPhone 11 Pro Max 256GB prices and deals. Get FREE SHIPPING on phones and devices with new activations.

executables.name: VideoSizeReducer
executables.description: Reduce the size of a video file by converting it to a lower resolution and/or lower bitrate. Receives the path to the video file as a parameter.
